content.rendered:
Coast To Coast Surveys Invoice terms: (strictly 30 Days)

  1. Accounts will be invoiced monthly and are due payable within 30 days of the date of invoice.
  2. If your account is not paid within the 30 days a $300 one off fee will be charged to your account immediately.
  3. A weekly interest fee of 1% will be charged on all overdue invoice amounts, until paid out.

If you are unable to pay your account, please call to arrange a payment plan immediately.
